sen.e: In China, according to chapter 'Shishigo' (bestowment of title to high virtue monks) in "The Essential History of Great-Song Monks" by Zanning in the beginning of Northern Song Dynasty, the origin is when shigo (title for high virtue monk) 'Sanei Daishi' was Imperially bestowed to Unko of 左街 and 'Joko Daishi' was Imperially bestowed to Sotetsu of 右街 in discussion in Engyosetsu on November 14 of the old calendar in 870, in the period of Emperor Iso in the latter half of Tang Dynasty.
